import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useEffect} from 'react'; import logo from './logo.png'; function App() { /*red color(maybe change/logo) + must select + refactor + comments + names_change + not default checked + red if bad day*/ const [nervous, setNervous] = useState("") const [sport, setSport] = useState("") const [happy, setHappy] = useState("") const [tired, setTired] = useState("") const [alertDiv, setAlertDiv] = useState("alert alert-warning alert-dismissible d-none fade") const [txt, setText] = useState("") const [invalidNervous, setInvalidNervous] = useState("form-check-input") const [invalidSport, setInvalidSport] = useState("form-check-input") const [invalidHappy, setInvalidHappy] = useState("form-check-input") const [invalidTired, setInvalidTired] = useState("form-check-input") const HandleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const count = 0; if(nervous === "") { setInvalidNervous("form-check-input is-invalid") count = 1 } else { setInvalidNervous("form-check-input") } if(sport === "") { setInvalidSport("form-check-input is-invalid") count = 1 } else setInvalidSport("form-check-input") if(happy === "") { setInvalidHappy("form-check-input is-invalid") count = 1 } else setInvalidHappy("form-check-input") if(tired === "") { setInvalidTired("form-check-input is-invalid") count = 1 } else setInvalidTired("form-check-input") if (count === 0) setAlertDiv("alert alert-success alert-dismissible w-25 mx-auto fade show") } function hideAlert() { setAlertDiv("alert alert-success alert-dismissible w-25 mx-auto d-none fade") } return ( <>
